Text: Hey, how do you watch this? I'm fine with matroska format and every other movie has worked fine sofar, but when i open this file, the window size adjusts, but the playing doesnt start. its just a black screen. clicking play does nothing. help. thanks

I've tried playing it on another PC, (same codecs installed as my first) and media player classic only played the sound. then on the same pc i tried windows media player 11 and it worked fine. This is strange. So why is it not working on my first pc? and why is media player classic not working? this is strange..
